Will Shiflett

Baltimore, MD · (202) 594-9549 · wrshif(at)gmail.com

"It's not about thinking quickly and being smart, but about being humble, eager to learn, and unwilling to fake it."
- Seth Freeman

Software Engineer and analytics professional with a penchant for protecting people's time and an obsession with keeping the end in mind. Comfortable in the weeds or high-level discussions. Makes insights accessible and actionable. Documents and shares knowledge. Collaborative, teachable, and ethical. Let’s solve some problems.

Experience

Software Engineer

BAO Systems

Software Engineering and systems support for the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR). Worked alongside end-users to develop features, fix bugs, improve system resilience, and deploy code using a GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline with an AWS Serverless Multi-Tier Architecture.

  • Decreased errors between data lake and BI layer by ~15% over one year by building an API endpoint that allowed the ETL team to inject test payloads directly into our data pipeline using Python, Lambda Functions, Step Functions, API Gateway, and S3; enforced payload schemas by building a linter with Glue, Apache Avro
  • Freed up developer time by ~10% in one year by proactively showing stakeholders the status of in-flight data with a web application that provided near-real-time ETL job statuses; built the backend using Python, Aurora, DynamoDB, and SQL
  • Reduced workbook build time by ~50% within six months by refactoring a highly visible system of record tool built from Excel, VBA, and SharePoint into a modern Python program while the system was in use; acted as one of two client-facing SMEs for the tool, supporting 50 countries, thousands of users, and a $4.8 billion budget
December 2022 - Present
